00042 static void choose_internal_diagonal_for_triangle(Domaine& domain)
00043 {
00044 // nothing to do
00045 }
00046 
00047 static void choose_internal_diagonal_for_tetrahedron(Domaine& domain)
00048 {
00049   const DoubleTab& nodes = domain.les_sommets();
00050   IntTab&           cells = domain.zone(0).les_elems();
00051 
00052   ArrOfDouble lengths(3);
00053 
00054   const int nb_cells = cells.dimension(0);
00055   for (int cell=0; cell<nb_cells; ++cell)
00056     {
00057       const int s0 = cells(cell,0);
00058       const int s1 = cells(cell,1);
00059       const int s2 = cells(cell,2);
00060       const int s3 = cells(cell,3);
00061 
00062       const double x0 = nodes(s0,0);
00063       const double x1 = nodes(s1,0);
00064       const double x2 = nodes(s2,0);
00065       const double x3 = nodes(s3,0);
00066 
00067       const double y0 = nodes(s0,1);
00068       const double y1 = nodes(s1,1);
00069       const double y2 = nodes(s2,1);
00070       const double y3 = nodes(s3,1);
00071 
00072       const double z0 = nodes(s0,2);
00073       const double z1 = nodes(s1,2);
00074       const double z2 = nodes(s2,2);
00075       const double z3 = nodes(s3,2);
00076 
00077       const double x01 = 0.5 * (x0+x1);
00078       const double x02 = 0.5 * (x0+x2);
00079       const double x03 = 0.5 * (x0+x3);
00080       const double x12 = 0.5 * (x1+x2);
00081       const double x13 = 0.5 * (x1+x3);
00082       const double x23 = 0.5 * (x2+x3);
00083 
00084       const double y01 = 0.5 * (y0+y1);
00085       const double y02 = 0.5 * (y0+y2);
00086       const double y03 = 0.5 * (y0+y3);
00087       const double y12 = 0.5 * (y1+y2);
00088       const double y13 = 0.5 * (y1+y3);
00089       const double y23 = 0.5 * (y2+y3);
00090 
00091       const double z01 = 0.5 * (z0+z1);
00092       const double z02 = 0.5 * (z0+z2);
00093       const double z03 = 0.5 * (z0+z3);
00094       const double z12 = 0.5 * (z1+z2);
00095       const double z13 = 0.5 * (z1+z3);
00096       const double z23 = 0.5 * (z2+z3);
00097 
00098       lengths[0] = (x23-x01)*(x23-x01) + (y23-y01)*(y23-y01) + (z23-z01)*(z23-z01);
00099       lengths[1] = (x13-x02)*(x13-x02) + (y13-y02)*(y13-y02) + (z13-z02)*(z13-z02);
00100       lengths[2] = (x12-x03)*(x12-x03) + (y12-y03)*(y12-y03) + (z12-z03)*(z12-z03);
00101 
00102       Cerr<<"ici" <<lengths<<finl;
00103       const int id = imin_array(lengths);
00104 
00105       if (id == 0)
00106         {
00107 // on echange les sommets 1 et 2
00108           cells(cell,1) = s2;
00109           cells(cell,2) = s1;
00110         }
00111       else if (id == 1)
00112         {
00113 // rien a faire
00114         }
00115       else if (id == 2)
00116         {
00117 // on echange les sommets 2 et 3
00118           cells(cell,2) = s3;
00119           cells(cell,3) = s2;
00120         }
00121       else
00122         {
00123           Cerr << "Error in Orienter_Simplexes 'choose_internal_diagonal_for_tetrahedron()'" << finl;
00124           Cerr << "   Internal error in 'imin_array()'" << finl;
00125           Process::exit();
00126         }
00127     }
00128 }
00129 
00130 static void choose_internal_diagonal(Domaine& domain)
00131 {
00132   const Nom& cell_type = domain.zone(0).type_elem().valeur().que_suis_je();
00133 
00134   Motcles understood_keywords(2);
00135   understood_keywords[0] = "Triangle";
00136   understood_keywords[1] = "Tetraedre";
00137 
00138   int rank = understood_keywords.search(cell_type);
00139   switch(rank)
00140     {
00141     case 0  :
00142       choose_internal_diagonal_for_triangle(domain);
00143       break;
00144     case 1  :
00145       choose_internal_diagonal_for_tetrahedron(domain);
00146       break;
00147     default :
00148       Cerr << "Error in Orienter_Simplexes.cpp 'choose_internal_diagonal()'" << finl;
00149       Cerr << "  Unknown cell type : " << cell_type << finl;
00150       Cerr << "  Orienter_Simplexes can only orient Triangles and Tetrahedrons" << finl;
00151       Process::exit();
00152     }
00153 }
00154 
00155 static void ensure_positive_volumes_for_triangle(Domaine& domain)
00156 {
00157   const DoubleTab& nodes = domain.les_sommets();
00158   IntTab&           cells = domain.zone(0).les_elems();
00159 
00160   const int nb_cells = cells.dimension(0);
00161   for (int cell=0; cell<nb_cells; ++cell)
00162     {
00163       const int s0 = cells(cell,0);
00164       const int s1 = cells(cell,1);
00165       const int s2 = cells(cell,2);
00166 
00167       const double x0 = nodes(s0,0);
00168       const double x1 = nodes(s1,0);
00169       const double x2 = nodes(s2,0);
00170 
00171       const double y0 = nodes(s0,1);
00172       const double y1 = nodes(s1,1);
00173       const double y2 = nodes(s2,1);
00174 
00175       const double area = 0.5 * ((x1-x0)*(y2-y0) - (x2-x0)*(y1-y0));
00176       if ( area < 0.)
00177         {
00178 // on echange les sommets 0 et 2
00179           cells(cell,0) = s2;
00180           cells(cell,2) = s0;
00181         }
00182     }
00183 }
00184 
00185 static void ensure_positive_volumes_for_tetrahedron(Domaine& domain)
00186 {
00187   const DoubleTab& nodes = domain.les_sommets();
00188   IntTab&           cells = domain.zone(0).les_elems();
00189 
00190   const int nb_cells = cells.dimension(0);
00191   for (int cell=0; cell<nb_cells; ++cell)
00192     {
00193       const int s0 = cells(cell,0);
00194       const int s1 = cells(cell,1);
00195       const int s2 = cells(cell,2);
00196       const int s3 = cells(cell,3);
00197 
00198       const double x0 = nodes(s0,0);
00199       const double x1 = nodes(s1,0);
00200       const double x2 = nodes(s2,0);
00201       const double x3 = nodes(s3,0);
00202 
00203       const double y0 = nodes(s0,1);
00204       const double y1 = nodes(s1,1);
00205       const double y2 = nodes(s2,1);
00206       const double y3 = nodes(s3,1);
00207 
00208       const double z0 = nodes(s0,2);
00209       const double z1 = nodes(s1,2);
00210       const double z2 = nodes(s2,2);
00211       const double z3 = nodes(s3,2);
00212 
00213       const double volume = (1./6.) * ( (x1-x0) * (y2-y0) * (z3-z0) +
00214                                         (x2-x0) * (y3-y0) * (z1-z0) +
00215                                         (x3-x0) * (y1-y0) * (z2-z0) -
00216                                         (z1-z0) * (y2-y0) * (x3-x0) -
00217                                         (x2-x0) * (z3-z0) * (y1-y0) -
00218                                         (y3-y0) * (x1-x0) * (z2-z0)   );
00219 
00220       if (volume < 0.)
00221         {
00222 // on echange les sommets 0 et 2
00223           cells(cell,0) = s2;
00224           cells(cell,2) = s0;
00225         }
00226     }
00227 }
00228 
00229 
00230 static void ensure_positive_volumes(Domaine& domain)
00231 {
00232   const Nom& cell_type = domain.zone(0).type_elem().valeur().que_suis_je();
00233 
00234   Motcles understood_keywords(2);
00235   understood_keywords[0] = "Triangle";
00236   understood_keywords[1] = "Tetraedre";
00237 
00238   int rank = understood_keywords.search(cell_type);
00239   switch(rank)
00240     {
00241     case 0  :
00242       ensure_positive_volumes_for_triangle(domain);
00243       break;
00244     case 1  :
00245       ensure_positive_volumes_for_tetrahedron(domain);
00246       break;
00247     default :
00248       Cerr << "Error in Orienter_Simplexes.cpp 'ensure_positive_volumes()'" << finl;
00249       Cerr << "  Unknown cell type : " << cell_type << finl;
00250       Cerr << "  Orienter_Simplexes can only orient Triangles and Tetrahedrons" << finl;
00251       Process::exit();
00252     }
00253 }
00254 
00255 void Orienter_Simplexes::orient_domain(Domaine& domain)
00256 {
00257   choose_internal_diagonal(domain);
00258   ensure_positive_volumes(domain);
00259 }
00260 
00261 Entree& Orienter_Simplexes::interpreter_(Entree& is)
00262 {
00263   associer_domaine(is);
00264 
00265   Domaine& domain = domaine();
00266   Scatter::uninit_sequential_domain(domain);
00267   orient_domain(domain);
00268   Scatter::init_sequential_domain(domain);
00269 
00270   return is;
00271 }
